ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | opprval.1 | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | opprval.2 | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 3 |  | opprval.3 | |- O = ( oppR ` R ) |
| 4 |  | opprmulfval.4 | |- .xb = ( .r ` O ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_crngcom | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .x. Y ) = ( Y .x. X ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_opprmul | |- ( X .xb Y ) = ( Y .x. X ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .x. Y ) = ( X .xb Y ) ) |
